title: Ip Party!
body:
So, we all seem to be putting our lives on hold to participate in the grandest party ever.

Lasting all weekend we have been racking up some serous ip over the course and I want to ask you to share your achievements in reaping Ip.

Let's see who can get the most Ip this weekend, tell us all about it on sunday!

EDIT: For those who can't find a game, look up "Oceanic LoL" (without quotes) in the create chat group tab (next to friends list at the bottom) and you will be spammed invites every few seconds

replies.body: add me I'm trying to get ip @julzdajoka
You're posting on the OCE board mate with a NA account
